title: Instant Feedback Message
body:
I was attempting to read a message that popped up on my screen and it disappeared, the top of it said instant feedback.. Anyone got any info on what it said ?
{{summoner:12}}

replies.body: This may have been the notification that someone you recently reported was punished by the[ Instant Feedback System](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-).  Thanks for helping to keep the community fair and fun!
Same thing happened to me.  Is there a way I can "reread" the dialog box?
